title: Luxurious Vanuatu Beachfront Villas on Eratap Peninsula with Private Island Access
description: Step into island luxury at Eratap Beach Resort - Vanuatu’s first high-end boutique resort and the first hotel in the South Pacific to earn a spot on Tripadvisor’s Top 25 Hotels of the World. Wake in your private villa to sweeping views of the Pacific Ocean, with easy access to Port Vila and the uninhabited islands nearby. Embrace the resort’s beachfront setting with snorkelling, surfing, kayaking and village hikes - or simply unwind with a rejuvenating spa treatment and indulge in fresh, locally inspired cuisine at the oceanfront restaurant.
offer_address: Eratap Beach, Port Vila, Efate Island, Vanuatu
